desc: Kato Polyclay is a collaboration with Van Aken International and Donna Kato. It is known to be the strongest polymer clay on the market, and is the first polymer clay created by an artist, for artists.

layout.text: YOU'VE POURED YOUR HEART AND SOUL INTO YOUR ART, BAKE SOMETHING THAT LASTS.
Stronger than other clays, objects made with Kato Polyclay become permanent works of art that will resist breaking and wear over time.
